en: An internal server error has occured.
Make room in your normal storage chest before changing vocations. (JOBCHANGE_STORAGE_FULL)
An internal server error has occured. (PRICE_NO_MATCH)
You don't have enough gold to craft this item.
An item-related desync has occurred. Please log out and back in. (ITEM_INVALID_ITEM_NUM)
You don't have enough Golden Gemstones.
Make room in your item bag before trying again. (ITEM_BAG_CAPACITY_OVER)
Make room in your normal storage chest before trying again. (ITEM_STORAGE_CAPACITY_OVER)
Make room in your normal storage chest before trying again. (ITEM_STORAGE_OVERFLOW)
The party leader must start this content first.
Not all party members have the same progress in this content.
One or more augments on this preset have not been learned by this character.
This character does not have enough points to apply this preset.
